titleStmt.title: By the Quene, A proclamation to explane the Quenes Maiesties meanyng, vpon a former made in March last
Proclamations. 1564-05-11
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation declaring that ships from the Low Countries driven into English ports by stress of weather shall not be confiscated.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
